00001| import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server'
00002| 
00003| // Fallback translation for common phrases
00004| function getFallbackTranslation(text: string, targetLanguage: string): string | null {
00005|   const lowerText = text.toLowerCase().trim()
00006|   
00007|   const commonPhrases: Record<string, Record<string, string>> = {
00008|     'hello': {
00009|       'Danish': 'Hej',
00010|       'Swedish': 'Hej', 
00011|       'Norwegian': 'Hei',
00012|       'Finnish': 'Hei',
00013|       'German': 'Hallo',
00014|       'French': 'Bonjour',
00015|       'Spanish': 'Hola',
00016|       'Italian': 'Ciao',
00017|       'Portuguese': 'Olá',
00018|       'Dutch': 'Hallo',
00019|       'Polish': 'Cześć',
00020|       'Russian': 'Привет'
00021|     },
00022|     'good morning': {
00023|       'Danish': 'God morgen',
00024|       'Swedish': 'God morgon',
00025|       'Norwegian': 'God morgen', 
00026|       'Finnish': 'Hyvää huomenta',
00027|       'German': 'Guten Morgen',
00028|       'French': 'Bonjour',
00029|       'Spanish': 'Buenos días',
00030|       'Dutch': 'Goedemorgen'
00031|     },
00032|     'thank you': {
00033|       'Danish': 'Tak',
00034|       'Swedish': 'Tack',
00035|       'Norwegian': 'Takk',
00036|       'Finnish': 'Kiitos',
00037|       'German': 'Danke',
00038|       'French': 'Merci',
00039|       'Spanish': 'Gracias',
00040|       'Dutch': 'Dank je'
00041|     },
00042|     'wat gaan we vanavond eten': {
00043|       'Danish': 'Hvad skal vi spise i aften?',
00044|       'Swedish': 'Vad ska vi äta ikväll?',
00045|       'Finnish': 'Mitä syömme tänä iltana?',
00046|       'German': 'Was essen wir heute Abend?',
00047|       'French': 'Que mangeons-nous ce soir?',
00048|       'Spanish': '¿Qué vamos a cenar esta noche?',
00049|       'English': 'What are we going to eat tonight?',
00050|       'Italian': 'Cosa mangiamo stasera?',
00051|       'Portuguese': 'O que vamos comer hoje à noite?',
00052|       'Polish': 'Co będziemy jeść dziś wieczorem?'
00053|     },
00054|     'wat eten we': {
00055|       'Danish': 'Hvad spiser vi?',
00056|       'Swedish': 'Vad äter vi?',
00057|       'Finnish': 'Mitä syömme?',
00058|       'German': 'Was essen wir?',
00059|       'French': 'Que mangeons-nous?',
00060|       'Spanish': '¿Qué comemos?',
00061|       'English': 'What are we eating?'
00062|     }
00063|   }
00064|   
00065|   for (const [phrase, translations] of Object.entries(commonPhrases)) {
00066|     if (lowerText.includes(phrase)) {
00067|       return translations[targetLanguage] || null
00068|     }
00069|   }
00070|   
00071|   return null
00072| }
00073| 
00074| // Official EU Languages (24 languages) - Language mapping for translation API
00075| const LANGUAGE_MAP: Record<string, string> = {
00076|   auto: 'auto',
00077|   
00078|   // Popular EU Languages
00079|   en: 'English',
00080|   de: 'German', 
00081|   fr: 'French',
00082|   es: 'Spanish',
00083|   it: 'Italian',
00084|   pt: 'Portuguese',
00085|   pl: 'Polish',
00086|   nl: 'Dutch',
00087|   
00088|   // Nordic EU Languages
00089|   da: 'Danish',
00090|   sv: 'Swedish',
00091|   fi: 'Finnish',
00092|   
00093|   // Western EU Languages
00094|   ga: 'Irish',
00095|   mt: 'Maltese',
00096|   
00097|   // Central EU Languages
00098|   cs: 'Czech',
00099|   sk: 'Slovak',
00100|   hu: 'Hungarian',
00101|   sl: 'Slovenian',
00102|   hr: 'Croatian',
00103|   
00104|   // Eastern EU Languages
00105|   bg: 'Bulgarian',
00106|   ro: 'Romanian',
00107|   lt: 'Lithuanian',
00108|   lv: 'Latvian',
00109|   et: 'Estonian',
00110|   
00111|   // Southern EU Languages
00112|   el: 'Greek',
00113| }
00114|

00116|   try {

00119|

import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server'

// Fallback translation for common phrases
function getFallbackTranslation(text: string, targetLanguage: string): string | null {
  const lowerText = text.toLowerCase().trim()
  
  const commonPhrases: Record<string, Record<string, string>> = {
    'hello': {
      'Danish': 'Hej',
      'Swedish': 'Hej', 
      'Norwegian': 'Hei',
      'Finnish': 'Hei',
      'German': 'Hallo',
      'French': 'Bonjour',
      'Spanish': 'Hola',
      'Italian': 'Ciao',
      'Portuguese': 'Olá',
      'Dutch': 'Hallo',
      'Polish': 'Cześć',
      'Russian': 'Привет'
